patthana17.22:4.1: Vipākadhammadhammaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca navipākadhammadhammo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.22:4.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana17.22:5.1: Vipākadhammadhammaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca navipākadhammadhammo naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.22:5.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana17.22:6.1: Nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
